qualitative.reasoning: Reliance Industries, led by Mukesh Ambani, has demonstrated exceptional execution capabilities, successfully diversifying from oil-to-chemicals into consumer-facing sectors like Retail and Telecom (Jio) which now contribute significantly to EBITDA. The management has a strong track record of creating shareholder value and executing large-scale capital projects. While the conglomerate structure is complex, transparency and corporate governance standards are generally regarded as high for the Indian market.
